name: Birdie Poo
description:
If you could be any animal in the world, what would you be? Most people say a Bird. Now, in Birdie Poo you can become a bird! While you're soaring over traffic, it's your job, your duty, to poo on the passing cars. Each time you poo on a car, you get a point! How many poo points can you get?

INSTRUCTIONS:
1) Tap to Poo.
2) Poo on each car at least once.
3) Get one point for each time you Poo on a car.
4) If you miss a car, you lose.

• Easy to Play
• Fun for all ages
• Great Graphics!
• KID MODE (Best when used with Apple's Guided Access)
• Oh... And it's FREE!
• Download today!

HATCH COINS: When your bird flies away, you're given a new egg. Eggs take time to hatch. You can use a Hatch Coin to instantly hatch all of your eggs.

Enjoying Birdie Poo? Please rate & review it in the App Store! Have feedback? We'd love to hear from you! Use the "Provide Feedback" option in the menu to contact us.

THIS IS NOT A FLAPPY BIRD CLONE.
